welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Chioggia, known for its stunning canals, fresh seafood, and vibrant atmosphere. We invite you to immerse yourself in the city's beauty and indulge in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used primarily for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the network and completing a short registration process.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
